articles.title: Title of DPRK Labor Hero Awarded to Secretaries of Party Cells
articles.content:
Title of DPRK Labor Hero Awarded to Secretaries of Party Cells
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The title of the DPRK Labor Hero and Gold Medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class were awarded to secretaries of party cells of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Sun Ok, head of animals keeping team No. 2 of breeding and keeping shop No. 1 of the Central Zoo of the Pleasure Park General Bureau, An Ho Chun, journalist of the Second Section of the Fifth Department of the Korean Central News Agency, Ri Tong Ho, smelter of the Songjin Steel Complex, O Jae Hwan, culturist of the third work-team of production shop No. 4 of the Pupho Shallow Sea Culture Station in South Hwanghae Province, Hong Sun Jae, farmer of agricultural work-team No. 1 of the Ponghwa Co-op Farm in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, Kim Hak Su, farmer of agricultural work-team No. 11 of the Ryangdam Farm in Unchon County, South Hwanghae Province, Ri Kyong Hwa, feller of production work-team No. 2 of the Sollim Pass Station of the Phungso Forestry Station in Ryangg ang Province.
					They greatly contributed to positively arousing the masses to carrying out the Party's policies and strengthening the militant might of the Party by  raising the function and role of party cells, while  working faithfully true to the Party in others' presence or behind their back in difficult and labor-consuming fields for decades.
					
					A decree was promulgated by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK in this regard on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK People Vow to Win in Face-off with U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK People Vow to Win in Face-off with U.S.
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean people, including servicepersons, are categorically rejecting the "resolution on sanctions", cooked up by the UN Security Council at the initiative of the United States.
					"Even those countries taking permanent seats at the UNSC sided with the U.S. in adopting the 'resolution', overpowered by its high-handed practices. Their behaviors tell the DPRK that it should counter the U.S. only with strength," Kim Hyon Jin, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA.
					
					He further said:
					
					"Any sanctions do not work on the DPRK. The tightened 'sanctions' against the DPRK will only give vent to surging indignation of its people.
					
					The U.S.-led hostile forces should not run amuck, mindful that the KPA is in full readiness to fight a sacred war for justice.
					
					This year will mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (July 27, 1953). The KPA will deal a telling blow to the U.S. imperialists so that they dare not provoke the DPRK any longer, and thus adorn the anniversary with another victory in the showdown with them."
					
					Ju Ki Chol, a worker of the Chollima Steel Complex, said:
					
					"We, workers, are thirsting for revenge on the U.S. seeking to disarm the DPRK and overthrow its social system.
					
					We have a proud history of victory in the showdown with the U.S. In the 1950s the young DPRK won an all-out war with the U.S., which was boasting of being 'the strongest' in the world.
					
					Today the DPRK has turned into a power in space science and there is nothing to be afraid of. The military might of Songun Korea should be displayed to them to significantly mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war."

articles.title: Exemplary Primary Information Workers of Youth League Start Study Tour
articles.content:
Exemplary Primary Information Workers of Youth League Start Study Tour
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Exemplary primary information workers of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League across the country started the study tour of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp with the approach of his birth anniversary.
					A meeting took place on Friday before the start of the tour at the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province.
					
					The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung before the Tower and paid tribute to him.
					
					A report was made by Jang Hyon Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers said the young people would fully demonstrate the stamina of the Songun youth vanguard through the study tour.
					
					They called upon young people to make great achievements in the construction of the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, project for reconstructing and repairing railways in the northern part of the country, project for reclaiming Sepho tableland, etc. by learning from the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters.
					
					At the end of the meeting, the members of the study tour group marched toward Pochonbo, led by flags bearing portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and flying flags of the DPRK, the youth league and the study tour group.

articles.title: Quilt Decorations, One of Koreans' Traditional Living Customs
articles.content:
Quilt Decorations, One of Koreans' Traditional Living Customs
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The folklore village built in the Pyongyang Folklore Park showcases the traditional living customs of Koreans according to localities.
					One of them is the quilt decorations in rooms, peculiar to Phyongan provincial people in the period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					Quilts and pillows are piled up separately in good order on a cabinet decorated with pieces of pig iron, with a net-cloth wrapper covered on them.
					
					The inside of quilt is covered with white cotton cloth and the outside with silk of various colors.
					
					Each side of a pillow with white-color tick is adorned by embroideries featuring various species of animals and plants.
					
					Such quilt decorations render a room neat and tidy.
					
					The custom is one of things that represent the cultural attainments of the Korean people.

articles.title: UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" under Fire
articles.content:
UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" under Fire
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, released a statement on January 25 in support of the statements of the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					He said that the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 into its orbit in December last year received unstinted congratulations from progressive mankind as it was a legitimate exercise of sovereignty in line with international law on the use of space for peaceful purposes.
					
					The U.S. fabricated "a resolution on additional sanctions" against the DPRK at the UNSC after terming the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes "grave challenge" against peace and security of the world, he noted, and went on:
					
					It is the height of double standards to assert that the U.S. and its allies may launch satellites but only the DPRK which the U.S. regards with hostility is not allowed to do so and it should be subject to "sanctions" in case it defies this ban.
					
					This is a wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of an independent state.
					
					The National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in their statements resolutely denounced and rejected the illegal "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted by the UNSC.
					
					I strongly reject the "resolution" against the DPRK on behalf of the adherents to the Juche idea all over the world.
					
					And I fully support the statements of the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Chairmen of Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Jan. 29 denouncing the "resolution on sanctions" adoted at the United Nations Security Council against the DPRK.
					Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said:
					
					The DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 by its own efforts and with indigenous technology in accordance with the universally recognized international law on using outer space for peaceful purposes. The whole world supported this and even the U.S. and other hostile forces recognized it. 
					
					The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" which took issue only with the DPRK's satellite launch clearly indicated that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has reached an extreme phase.
					
					Japan, which serves the U.S. as its master, is working hard to trample down the national rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan while insisting that it will independently apply "sanctions" against the DPRK, he said, vowing to firmly defend Chongryon organizations and community of Koreans despite any intrigues and moves.
					
					Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the U.S. and its allies are undisguisedly threatening the global peace and security.
					
					He expressed the will to dynamically advance with the firm faith to reliably defend the security and sovereignty of the country and safeguard the socialist homeland with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed by the compatriots in the homeland in successfully launching satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.

articles.title: UNSC "Resolutions" against DPRK Unjust
articles.content:
UNSC "Resolutions" against DPRK Unjust
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- On Jan. 22 the U.S.-dominated UNSC fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" calling for hostile steps against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes. 
					The "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, a wanton violation of its sovereignty, is an entirely unjust one as it sought to prevent the DPRK from bolstering up its national defence, block economic development and infringe upon the right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes. 
					
					This time the U.S. and its allies cited the UNSC "resolutions" 1718 and 1874 as a ground for taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch. 
					
					Those anti-DPRK "resolutions" were products of the U.S.-led offensive for international pressure upon the DPRK to bring down the ideology and social system chosen by the Korean people and the DPRK has, therefore, never recognized them from the outset. 
					
					Those countries meekly obedient to the U.S. are allowed to conduct nuclear test and launch missiles, but those countries courting its displeasure should be deprived of any right to bolster up defence capability or use space for peaceful purposes. This is the jungle logic that runs through the "resolutions".
					
					On October 14, 2006, the UNSC at the prodding of the U.S. fabricated the "resolution" 1718 on "sanctions" against the DPRK allegedly to cope with its development of nuclear, missiles, etc., asserting that the first nuclear test of the DPRK posed "threat to the international peace". 
					
					Scientists and technicians of the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 2 by their own efforts and their own technology and wisdom on April 5, 2009 despite persistent political and military pressure, threats and blockade of the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					The hostile forces, however, made public on April 14, 2009, a "presidential statement" of the UNSC, taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch, hurting the dignity of the Korean people and blatantly violating the sovereignty of the DPRK. On June 12, they cooked up another anti-DPRK "resolution" 1874, finding fault with its second nuclear test conducted as part of self-defence steps. 
					
					It is nothing new that the UNSC played into the hands of the U.S. in enforcing a hostile policy towards the DPRK, pressurized by its highhanded and arbitrary practices. 
					
					It was due to the U.S. that at any meeting of the UN Security Council its members could not have sincere dialogue and negotiations to find a fair solution to issues but used to allow the fabrication of unjust "resolutions" calling for unilateral sanctions, pressure and blockade against the DPRK, pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. characterized by the application of double standards.
					
					The U.S. claimed that tightened sanctions alone can solve the Korean issue. It has systematically used the UN as a means for internationalizing the hostile conception and policy that the DPRK should be banned from using nuclear energy and developing space because they can lead to the bolstering up of its military capability, threat to the U.S.
					
					The recent racket for "sanctions" against the DPRK is part of above-said impudent scenario of the U.S.
					
					The prevailing situation goes to prove that the principle of equal sovereignty clarified in the UN Charter remains only in name and justice should be protected by every nation's own efforts and it is necessary to cope with the U.S. hostile policy by force, not by word. 
					
					It also proves that the road of independence, Songun and socialism chosen by the DPRK is the just one.
					
					Even though the UNSC comes out with any "presidential statement" and "resolution" or with something tougher than them, the DPRK will never tolerate them but vehemently denounce them if they violate the just sovereign rights of the DPRK even a bit.
					
					The UNSC should make an apology for the crimes it committed by seriously violating the sovereignty of an independent state as a marionette of the U.S. and withdraw all its unjust "resolutions" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Papers Denounce Japanese Imperialists' Colonial Rule over Korea by "Resident General"
articles.content:
Papers Denounce Japanese Imperialists' Colonial Rule over Korea by "Resident General"
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists established "Residency-General" in Korea on February 1, 1906 for the colonial rule after fabricating the "Ulsa (1905) Five-Point Treaty".
					Newspapers on Friday say that the crimes the Japanese imperialists committed by enforcing the colonial "Resident-General" rule for several decades after invading Korea were the harshest and barbarous one in history. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun says in a bylined article:
					
					During the "Resident-General" rule the Japanese imperialists imposed immeasurable calamities and sufferings upon the Korean people. 
					
					Under the pretext of "suppressing rioters" the Japanese imperialists dispatched repressive forces not only to main cities but also to mountainous villages, perpetrating bestial "punitive" operations against units of the Volunteer Army. They set fire to every village visited by volunteers and mercilessly shot to death those people who were in touch with those volunteers. 
					
					They ran amuck to turn Korea into a base for raw materials and sources and market for their goods. Under the signboard of "promotion of people's well-being" they cooked up the "law on mineral mining" in June of 1906, massively plundered Korea of gold, silver, copper, coal and other underground resources. In November of 1908 they fabricated the "fishery agreement," looting marine resources at random. 
					
					During the period the Japanese imperialists made desperate efforts to benumb patriotism and national identity of the Korean people. 
					
					In August of 1906 they promulgated the "ordinance on common schools" to force the colonial slave education. They promulgated the "ordinance on private schools" in 1908, forcefully closing patriotic and anti-Japanese private schools. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries should make an apology and reparation for the monstrous crimes committed against the Korean nation in the past. Nevertheless, they are now beautifying the history of colonial rule over Korea and whetting their swords for reinvasion in a bid to realize the old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere," availing themselves of the U.S. imperialists' moves for invading the DPRK. 
					
					Minju Joson in a bylined article says if Japan beautifies its crime-woven past history and ignites a war of aggression, it can never escape a final ruin.

articles.title: Japan's Residency-General Rule over Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Residency-General Rule over Korea
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- It is 107 years since the Japanese imperialists began establishing a colonial residency-general rule over Korea. 
					After faking up the "Ulsa Five-Point Treaty" in 1905, the Japanese imperialist aggressors deprived the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) of all its real power, with the residency-general set up in Seoul in 1906 as machinery for colonial rule. 
					
					The residency-general was headed by Hirobumi Ito, the ringleader of aggression on Korea. The resident-general, directly under the Japanese king, was a de facto ruler in Korea, privileged with all rights to take control of legislature, judicature, administration and military affairs.
					
					While enforcing residency-general rule, the Japanese imperialists left intact the government of the Feudal Joson Dynasty as a tool to disguise their colonial rule and calm down the Korean people's anti-Japan sentiments. They alleged that the residency-general was no more than an agency merely assisting the dynasty.
					
					With the establishment of this residency-general, they laid political, economic and military foundations for completely colonizing Korea.
					
					The DPRK people will surely make Japan pay dear price for all crimes it committed during its colonial rule over Korea.

articles.title: No Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula without Denuclearization of World: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula without Denuclearization of World: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is impossible unless the world is denuclearized as it has become clear now that the U.S. policy hostile to the DPRK remains unchanged, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is the issue that the DPRK initiated in view of the nuclear threat of the U.S. and for whose solution the DPRK has made positive efforts. 
					
					The DPRK government warned in April 1959 against the U.S. imperialists' conversion of south Korea into a nuclear base and advanced a proposal to establish a peace zone in Asia free from nuclear weapons.
					
					The U.S. blocked the denuclearization of the peninsula while spreading the story about "effectiveness" of nuclear weapons, far from accepting the positive proposal of the DPRK. 
					
					The U.S. staged ceaseless war exercises of various forms in south Korea and its vicinity with nuclear forces involved, imposing nuclear threat and blackmail upon the DPRK and increasing the danger of nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The grave situation prevailing in the peninsula where the DPRK is exposed to grave nuclear threat of the U.S. required the DPRK to physically cope with its increased moves to stifle the DPRK. That was why the DPRK determined to have access to deterrent and had no option but to put it into action.
					
					The U.S. pulled up the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes, terming it "a ballistic missile launch", and fabricated the "resolution" at the UNSC. This was a product and height of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					Now that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has entered its more dangerous phase, it will focus all its efforts not on the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula but on that of the world.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Evade Responsibility for Sexual Slavery: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Evade Responsibility for Sexual Slavery: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers in New York State recently proposed a resolution on the issue of the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					The resolution branded the issue of the sexual slavery as "the most typical slave trade in the 20th century" and demanded the Japanese government recognize the historical responsibility and inform posterity of such criminal acts.
					
					The Australian foreign minister at a recent joint interview with his Japanese counterpart said that the issue of the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army is one of the darkest events in modern history and expressed concern over the Japanese government's attempt to reexamine "Kono's statement" in 1993 which admitted the coercion involved in enforcing sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					These facts go to prove that Japan's attitude to persistently shun an apology and reparation for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity in the past is touching off strong resentment of the international community.
					
					In the past the Japanese authorities have worked hard to evade the responsibility for the sexual slavery, asserting that there is no ample evidence proving the sexual slavery and the issue had already been settled. 
					
					It is the calculation of the Japanese militarists that to teach the younger generation its disgraceful history would be a hurdle to realizing their ambition for overseas aggression. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries are set to bring back the period when the Japanese imperialists invaded Asian countries and trampled down the destiny of the people there in the first half of the last century. 
					
					They are doggedly denying the past crimes to implement the ambition for overseas aggression, realize the old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" and revenge their defeat. Herein lie the gravity and danger of the Japanese reactionaries' persistent moves to deny the past crimes. 
					
					Their despicable moves to deny the past crimes and evade the responsibility for them would only add to their crimes. 
					
					The Japanese authorities should honestly admit the past crimes and make sincere apology and full reparation for them as demanded by the international community.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Accused of Racket for "Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Accused of Racket for "Sanctions" against DPRK
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an article denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities for their racket for "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					The U.S. and south Korea are crying out for "independent sanctions" against the DPRK, not content with using the platform of the United Nations against the DPRK's satellite launch, the article said, adding this is a continuation of their endless "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime and the U.S. administration have pressurized the DPRK, talking about "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" and strategic patient policy but they could hardly prove effective, the article noted.
					
					It is improper to persistently kick up the "sanctions" racket, it added.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Its Racket for "Additional Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Its Racket for "Additional Sanctions" against DPRK
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime's racket for additional sanctions against the DPRK is a hostile action intended to do harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces and a dangerous one to bring the disaster of a nuclear war to the Korean nation, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					The Lee Myung Bak regime, which is bereft of even an iota of national soul and feels no shame, is taking the lead in the criminal international offensive for pressurizing the DPRK, pursuant to foreign forces' confrontation with it, the article says, adding:
					
					The Lee regime's campaign for tightening "sanctions" against the DPRK in league with outside forces is aimed at realizing its scenario for invading the DPRK at any cost. 
					
					Its extra zeal to tighten the "alliance" with the U.S. is also intended to invade the DPRK by dint of military nexus with the U.S.
					
					Peace and peaceful reunification can never be expected on the Korean Peninsula and the Korean nation can never escape disaster unless the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime are eliminated.
					
					The above-said campaign of the Lee regime for additional "sanctions" against the DPRK is little short of open declaration of a war against it as it means an unprecedented military provocation. 
					
					The Lee regime is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can achieve its aggressive aims through the U.S.-backed campaign for additional "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					No "sanctions" campaign can work on the DPRK.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Sanctions" Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Sanctions" Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Ten organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress released a joint statement on Jan. 29 in protest against the puppet regime's racket for "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					It is despicable that the north's satellite launch was labeled a "long-range missile launch" and the "resolution on sanctions" fabricated, the statement charged.
					
					A lot of countries launch satellites but there is no country which was subject to "sanctions", it said, and went on:
					
					To impose "sanctions" on the DPRK only over its satellite launch is contrary to the principle of equality as it is based on the logic of powers.
					
					It is quite possible that the north rebuffed the strange logic that what the U.S. launches is a satellite but what the north launches is a long-range missile.
					
					If the south Korean authorities and the U.S. fail to lift "sanctions", this will spark a crisis on the Korean Peninsula baffling imagination and further deteriorate the situation. 
					
					In case the hostile policy toward the north is allowed to persist, we will stage a strong protest.

articles.title: S. Korean Metal Workers Stage General Strikes
articles.content:
S. Korean Metal Workers Stage General Strikes
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Metal Workers Union staged general strikes in Seoul, Taejon, Kwangju, Pusan and other places in North and South Chungchong, North and South Jolla and South Kyongsang provinces on Jan. 30 in protest against the "government" authorities' unpopular rule.
					The organization said it would not halt strikes unless such demands of the workers as abolition of layoff and end to moves to destroy trade unions are met.
					
					That day the Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally as regards the general strikes of the Metal Workers Union.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Finnish Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Finnish Newspaper
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Finnish paper Tyokansan Sanomat on January 23 carried the part dealing with national reunification of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					The paper illustrated it with a photo of Kim Jong Un making the New Year Address.

articles.title: Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Nepal
articles.content:
Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in Nepal
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A Nepali national preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Kathmandu on January 25.
					C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to conduct media activities and organize colorful political and cultural events for introducing the immortal feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Observed in Uganda
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Observed in Uganda
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- An Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of Shining Star) was inaugurated with due ceremony in Kampala on January 24.
					The adviser to the Ugandan president was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in France
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Commemorated in France
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed with due ceremony in Paris on January 24.
					Andre Aubry was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting, seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and film show between January 25 and February 16.

articles.title: British Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
British Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on January 25 in support of the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					The statement said just is the stand of the DPRK which declared all-out confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					The U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean people, ringleader of the world reactionary forces, chieftain of invasion and war and bulwark of modern colonialism, it noted.
					
					We fully support the unshakable will of the DPRK to emerge victorious in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy, it said, adding:
					
					The anti-U.S. struggle of the DPRK will greatly inspire the world people aspiring after independence, national liberation and socialism.
					
					We pay tribute to Songun Korea.
					
					We are convinced that the Korean people will surely achieve final victory in the anti-U.S. struggle, upholding the red flag of Songun under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					On the same day the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain said in a statement:
					
					We oppose and reject the UNSC's "resolution" critical of the DPRK's satellite launch.
					
					No "sanctions" can bring the DPRK to its knees.
					
					The Korean people are fully prepared to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country, closely united around Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					The DPRK will continue to exercise its right to satellite launch and further bolster up its nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: Austrian Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
Austrian Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Austrian organizations adopted a statement on January 24 in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry.
					The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK said:
					
					It is a common knowledge that though many countries launch satellites by rockets, this has never been problematic at the UNSC.
					
					But the double standards were applied to the satellite launch of the DPRK, seriously violating the universally accepted international law on the right to the use of space for peaceful purposes and wantonly infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					We denounce the UNSC's "resolution".
					
					The UNSC should retract the "resolution" without delay and officially apologize to the DPRK for it.
					
					The Federal Leadership of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation stressed that it fully supports all the measures of the DPRK for defending its sovereignty.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by Ecuadorian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by Ecuadorian Organizations
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, Canar Provincial Institute for Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador and the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People released a joint statement on Jan. 25 in support of the statements of the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK. 
					The joint statement said:
					
					The world progressives warmly congratulate the DPRK on its successful launch of the scientific and technological satellite in December of 2012 entirely by their own efforts and with indigenous technology despite the blockade of the imperialists for more than half a century. 
					
					However, the U.S. and its allies groundlessly pulled up the DPRK over its satellite launch and fabricated another anti-DPRK "resolution" at the UN Security Council, an indication of their displeasure with the development of science and technology in the DPRK. 
					
					No matter how desperately the U.S. and other member nations of the UNSC cook up anti-DPRK "resolutions" bereft of reason, the DPRK will remain undeterred by them.
					
					Under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK will advance straight along the way chosen by itself for the development of science and technology and improved people's living standard. 
					
					All the progressive people and organizations of Ecuador fully support the statements of the DPRK reflecting its steadfast stand and categorically reject the unjust "resolution" of the UNSC.

articles.title: Political Party of Chile Supports Just Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Political Party of Chile Supports Just Cause of Korean People
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The National Information Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) issued a press release titled "The DPRK showed once again how it defends the sovereignty of the country from the threat of the imperialists" on January 25.
					When some countries fail to pursue independent policies, yielding to the pressure of the imperialists, only the DPRK is resolutely standing up against the moves of the imperialists to stifle it, the press release said, and went on:
					
					The DPRK in its statements of the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry resolutely denounced and rejected the UNSC's "resolution" which pulled up it over its satellite launch in December last year, terming it the launch that used the ballistic missile technology.
					
					And it declared before the world that it would take all measures to defend the sovereignty of the country.
					
					It has legitimately exercised its sovereignty in the international arena as it has never harbored any illusion about imperialism. It is dealing blows at imperialists-dominated UN and other international organizations.
					
					Today the world people again witness the dignity and determination of the DPRK.
					
					This greatly inspires us in our struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported Abroad
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, released a statement on January 25 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					The U.S. and its allies made desperate efforts to block the DPRK's victorious advance and finally cooked up the UNSC's "resolution" in violation of the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK, the vice-president said, and went on:
					
					This unreasonable action taken by the UNSC in violation of a sovereign state's right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes deserves condemnation.
					
					The DPRK can never become a target of sanctions as it continues legitimately exercising its independent and legal right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes in line with the universally accepted international law on the use of space for peaceful purposes. 
					
					All the measures taken by the DPRK are to defend its sovereignty.
					
					Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said in his statement on the same day in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry:
					
					The UNSC's recent "resolution" is a product of high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S.
					
					And it clearly indicates that the UN whose mission is to ensure world peace has been reduced to a servant for some big countries, bereft of impartiality.
					
					We denounce and reject the UNSC's "resolution" against the DPRK and extend full support and solidarity to its decisive stand.
					
					Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people under the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					No one can block the advance of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Highly Praised
Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The exploits of leader Kim Jong Il performed for the human cause of independence will always be remembered by the world people.
					The adviser to the Ugandan president said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) held on January 24.
					
					The Day of the Shining Star is the most significant day not only for the Korean people but also for progressive mankind, he noted, and went on:
					
					The Korean people under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un are dynamically advancing along the path of socialism.
					
					Kim Jong Un held higher the banner of Songun true to the intentions of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 in December last year was a striking demonstration of the overall national power of Songun Korea.
					
					I wish the Korean people great success in their drive for building an economic giant and achieving national reunification in hearty response to the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Otorgado titulo de Heroe del Trabajo a los secretarios de celula del PTC
articles.content:
Otorgado titulo de Heroe del Trabajo a los secretarios de celula del PTC
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- Fueron otorgados el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a los secretarios de celula del partido.
					Ellos son Kim Sun Ok, jefa del equipo no.2 de cuidadores de mamiferos del taller no.1 de cria y cuidado del Parque Zoologico Nacional, An Ho Chun, periodista de la seccion no.2 del departamento no.5 de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea, Ri Tong Ho, fundidor del Complejo de Acero Songjin, O Jae Hwan, cultivador del equipo de trabajo no.3 del taller de produccion no.4 de la empresa de cultivos maritimos de Pupho de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, Hong Sun Jae, campesino de la brigada de produccion agricola no.1 de la Granja Cooperativa de Ponghwa del capitalino distrito de Kangdong, Kim Hak Su, campesino de la brigada de produccion agricola no.11 de la Granja de Ryangdam del distrito de Unchon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, y Ri Kyong Hwa, talador del equipo de produccion no.2 de la estacion de Sangrimryong de la empresa forestal de Phungso de la provincia de Ryanggang.
					
					Los condecorados contribuyeron mucho al incremento del poderio combativo del partido apoyandolo fielmente durante varios decenios en los dificiles puestos de trabajo y movilizando activamente a las masas a la materializacion de las politicas del partido al elevar la funcion y papel de las celulas.
					
					Quedo publicado la vispera el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.

articles.title: Naturaleza criminal de resoluciones no.1718 y no.1874 de CS de la ONU
articles.content:
Naturaleza criminal de resoluciones no.1718 y no.1874 de CS de la ONU
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- El 22 de enero pasado, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU aprobo a instigacion de Estados Unidos la "resolucion de sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de lanzamiento de su satelite con fines pacificos con el objetivo de frenar el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional y el desarrollo economico de esta y privarle del derecho al lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos. 
					Esta vez, Estados Unidos y sus seguidores cuestionaron el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC en virtud de las "resoluciones" no. 1718 y no. 1874 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					La RPDC no reconocio ni una vez esos productos de la ofensiva de presion internacional auspiciada por EE.UU. cuyo objetivo reside en derrocar la ideologia y el regimen optados por el pueblo coreano. 
					
					Las "resoluciones" mencionadas se caracterizan por la doctrina gangsteril de impedir a los paises que no agradan a EE.UU. el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional y hasta el derecho al uso del cosmos con fines pacificos.
					
					El 14 de octubre de 2006, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, a instigacion de EE.UU., aprobo la "resolucion" no.1718 que permite ejercer la "sancion" a la RPDC en los dominios relacionados con las armas nucleares, misiles y otros calificando la primera prueba nuclear de la RPDC de "amenaza a la paz internacional". 
					
					Aun en medio de las persistentes presiones politicas y militares, la amenaza y el bloqueo de las fuerzas imperialistas aliadas, los cientificos y tecnicos coreanos lanzaron exitosamente el 5 de abril de 2009 el satelite "Kwangmyongsong-2" fabricado con su propia fuerza, tecnologia e inteligencia.
					
					Pero, las fuerzas hostiles publicaron el 14 de abril la "declaracion del presidente" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que insulta la dignidad del pueblo coreano e infringe flagrantemente la soberania de la RPDC cuestionando el lanzamiento del satelite. Y el 12 de junio, volvieron a fabricar la "resolucion" anti-RPDC no. 1874 so pretexto de de la segunda prueba nuclear.
					
					No es la primera vez que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fue utilizado en la maniobra de hostilidad a la RPDC de EE.UU. por haberse rendido ante su despotismo y sus arbitrariedades. 
					
					Debido al imperio, en las reuniones del Consejo de Seguridad no se han realizado ninguna vez el dialogo y negociaciones sinceros para buscar la via imparcial de la solucion del problema y se fabricaban segun el guion de EE.UU. las injustas "resoluciones" que imponen unilateralmente a la RPDC la "sancion", la presion y el bloqueo. 
					
					Considerando como si la "sancion" intransigente fuera el "unico remedio" de la solucion del problema coreano, EE.UU. vino abusando sistematicamente de la ONU para internacionalizar su concepcion y politica hostiles, segun la cual se debe impedir el uso de energia nuclear y el desarrollo del cosmos de la RPDC que serviran para el fortalecimiento de la capacidad militar para amenazar al imperio. 
					
					La presente campana de "sancion" tambien es la continuacion de estas maniobras tan cinicas. 
					
					La situacion de hoy muestra que el principio de igualdad de la soberania anotado en la Carta de la ONU no pasa de ser letras vacias y que los paises deben defender la justicia solo con su propia fuerza y hacer frente a la politica hostil de EE.UU. no con la palabra sino con las fuerzas. 
					
					Y evidencia que es justo el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, optado por la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC no tolerara jamas la "declaracion del presidente" ni la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que denigran aun en lo minimo el derecho independiente de si misma. 
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debe pedir disculpas por su acto criminal de haber infringido gravemente la soberania de un Estado soberano actuando como titere de EE.UU. y revocar todas las injustas "resoluciones" anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun insiste en desnuclearizar el mundo entero
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun insiste en desnuclearizar el mundo entero
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- Dado que se ha confirmado lo inmutable de la politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos, es imposible la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana antes de que fuera desnuclearizado el mundo entero. 
					Ratifica el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este viernes y continua: 
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es un tema propuesto por la RPDC frente a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					Como parte de sus ingentes esfuerzos por resolver ese problema, en abril de 1959, el gobierno de la RPDC advirtio a EE.UU. sobre la conversion del suelo surcoreano en una base nuclear, y presento la iniciativa de fundar en Asia una zona pacifica sin armas nucleares. 
					
					En lugar de aceptar tal propuesta positiva, EE.UU. impidio el proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana difundiendo el rumor de las "ventajas" de armas nucleares. 
					
					Amenazo y chantajeo permanentemente con esos artefactos a la RPDC desarrollando en suelo surcoreano y su contorno los ejercicios belicos de toda indole en que participan muchas fuerzas armadas nucleares y aumento el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Ya que EE.UU. intensifica sus acciones para atropellar a la RPDC, esta se vio obligada a preparar el disuasivo nuclear en la medida necesaria para disuadir fisicamente el intento del imperio.
					
					EE.UU. fabrico recientemente otra "resolucion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU describiendo el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos como "disparo de misil balistico", lo cual es la continuacion y climax de su politica hostil a la RPDC. 
					
					En tales circunstancias, la RPDC concentrara sus fuerzas no en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana sino en la del mundo entero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia Japon por evitar la responsabilidad de esclavas sexuales
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia Japon por evitar la responsabilidad de esclavas sexuales
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, los parlamentarios de Nueva York de Estados Unidos presentaron la resolucion referida al problema de "esclavas sexuales" para el viejo ejercito japones.
					El documento lo considera como la "mas representante accion de trafico de seres humanos del siglo 20" y exige al gobierno de la isla reconocer la responsabilidad historica y dar a conocer a las generaciones venideras tales actos criminales.
					
					Hace poco, el canciller australiano, en entrevista conjunta con su homologo japones, sostuvo que ese problema es "uno de los acontecimientos mas oscuros en la historia moderna" y expreso la preocupacion por la intencion del gobierno japones de reexaminar la "declaracion de Kono" de 1993 que reconoce el caracter forzoso de los crimenes de esclavas sexuales para el ejercito japones.
					
					En su comentario individual del dia primero, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que Japon elude a toda costa pedir disculpa e indemnizar sobre el caso referido, lo que causa la fuerte repugnancia de la sociedad internacional.
					
					En el tiempo pasado, las autoridades japonesas intentaron evitar su responsabilidad por el respecto diciendo que son insuficientes los datos de comprueba y que el problema ya fue resuelto, revela y prosigue:
					
					Si se siembra entre las nuevas generaciones la vergonzosa concepcion de historia, se puede frenar la ambicion de agredir a ultramar, esto es la naturaleza de los militaristas japoneses.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses quieren revitalizar el tiempo pasado en que agredieron y pisotearon despiadadamente el destino de los pueblos de los paises asiaticos en la primera mitad del siglo pasado.
					
					De esta manera, tratan de vengarse de su derrota al realizar su sueno viejo de "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" llevando a la practica su ambicion de agredir a ultramar. He aqui la gravedad y la peligrosidad de las persistentes y siniestras maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Cada vez que ellos niegan sus delitos del pasado y actuan vilmente para liberarse de su responsabilidad, centuplicaran sus crimenes.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben reconocer sinceramente sobre sus delitos del pasado conforme a la demanda de la sociedad internacional, pedir disculpa y tomar las medidas cabales para indemnizarlos.
